statements: SELECT * FROM FinancialRiskAnalysis WHERE id = 1;
SELECT market_data FROM FinancialRiskAnalysis WHERE id = 2;
SELECT historical_data FROM FinancialRiskAnalysis WHERE id = 3;
SELECT statistical_analysis->'average' AS average FROM FinancialRiskAnalysis WHERE id = 4;
SELECT id, market_data, historical_data FROM FinancialRiskAnalysis WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, market_data, historical_data, statistical_analysis FROM FinancialRiskAnalysis WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM FinancialRiskAnalysis WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT market_data, historical_data FROM FinancialRiskAnalysis WHERE id = 1 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT market_data, historical_data, statistical_analysis FROM FinancialRiskAnalysis WHERE id IN (2, 3) ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, statistical_analysis FROM FinancialRiskAnalysis WHERE id = 2 AND market_data = 'Market 1';
SELECT * FROM market_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, symbol, date, close_price FROM market_data WHERE volume > 1000000;
SELECT symbol, date, open_price FROM market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM statistical_analysis WHERE skewness < 0 ORDER BY mean_price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, symbol, standard_deviation FROM statistical_analysis WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE volume > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-28';
SELECT symbol, mean_price, standard_deviation FROM statistical_analysis WHERE mean_price > 50 ORDER BY standard_deviation ASC;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE symbol IN ('AAPL', 'GOOGL') AND date >= '2021-03-01' ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT id, date, skewness FROM statistical_analysis WHERE symbol = 'MSFT' AND date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM market_data;
SELECT symbol, date, closing_price FROM market_data WHERE volume > 10000;
SELECT symbol, AVG(closing_price) AS avg_price FROM market_data GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT symbol, date, closing_price FROM market_data ORDER BY closing_price DESC;
SELECT symbol, risk_score, risk_level FROM risk_management WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM market_data ORDER BY closing_price DESC;
SELECT symbol, closing_price FROM market_data WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, avg_price, stddev_price FROM statistical_analysis WHERE avg_price > 50;
SELECT symbol, risk_score, risk_level FROM risk_management WHERE risk_level = 'High' ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT symbol, date, closing_price, volume FROM market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM historical_market_data ORDER BY datetime DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, open_price, close_price FROM historical_market_data WHERE close_price > open_price AND stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT date, mean_value, standard_deviation FROM statistical_analysis WHERE z_score > 1.96 ORDER BY mean_value DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, risk_level, recommendation FROM financial_risk_management WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT date, trend_type FROM historical_trends WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_market_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY datetime DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT datetime, open_price, close_price FROM historical_market_data WHERE close_price > 100 ORDER BY datetime ASC;
SELECT stock_symbol, mean_value, z_score FROM statistical_analysis WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY mean_value DESC;
SELECT date, risk_level, recommendation FROM financial_risk_management WHERE risk_level = 'High' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_trends WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL' AND trend_type LIKE '%Up%' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM historical_market_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price FROM historical_market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT date, high_price, low_price FROM historical_market_data ORDER BY high_price DESC
SELECT symbol, mean, std_dev FROM statistical_analysis WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL'
SELECT date, symbol, action, quantity, price FROM client_transactions ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM historical_market_data ORDER BY date DESC, symbol ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price FROM historical_market_data WHERE date = '2023-09-15'
SELECT MAX(high_price) AS max_high_price, MIN(low_price) AS min_low_price FROM historical_market_data GROUP BY symbol ORDER BY max_high_price DESC
SELECT symbol, mean, std_dev FROM statistical_analysis WHERE mean > 0 AND std_dev > 0 ORDER BY mean DESC
SELECT symbol, beta, alpha, volatility FROM risk_assessment WHERE beta > 1 OR alpha < 0 ORDER BY volatility ASC
